name: CVE-2022-27497
description: Null pointer dereference in firmware for Intel(R) AMT before version 11.8.93, 11.22.93, 11.12.93, 12.0.92, 14.1.67, 15.0.42, 16.1.25 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via network access.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:intel:active_management_technology:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
